scripts.deploy:rules:intgr: firebase use intgr && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage:rules
scripts.deploy:rules:prod: node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.copyFileSync('firebase/firestore.rules.prod','firebase/firestore.rules');fs.copyFileSync('firebase/storage.rules.prod','firebase/storage.rules');" && firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage:rules && git checkout firebase/firestore.rules firebase/storage.rules
scripts.deploy:all:prod: node -e "const fs=require('fs');fs.copyFileSync('firebase/firestore.rules.prod','firebase/firestore.rules');fs.copyFileSync('firebase/storage.rules.prod','firebase/storage.rules');" && firebase use prod && firebase deploy && git checkout firebase/firestore.rules firebase/storage.rules
